name: The North Face Shellista Extreme Boots - Youths
description: Nothing's better than a snowday - snow forts, sledding, and snow angels. The Shellista Extreme is packed with warmth and protection for the cold days of winter.Waterproof leather and suede stands up to snowbanks.Cozy faux-fur lining with 200g Heatseeker® insulation for warm toes.Lower shell is flexible thermoplastic rubber.TNF Winter Grip® rubber keeps little ones upright on slippery paths.
